sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Kinship Navigator Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Kinship Navigator Act.

sections.heading: Kinship Navigator conferences: promotion
sections.text: The Department shall arrange for the conduct of 2 conferences, one in Cook County and one in Sangamon County, and provide for exhibits and activities for kinship caregivers and social service providers.

sections.heading: Kinship Navigator administration
sections.text: The Department, subject to appropriation, shall administer the Kinship Navigator through a contract with an NPO that has worked statewide with kinship families. The contract shall require that the program created by this Act will be coordinated with (i) the grandpa

sections.heading: Rules. The Department shall adopt the rules necessary for the implementation and administration of this Act.
sections.text: Rules. The Department shall adopt the rules necessary for the implementation and administration of this Act.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
